question: How much did I spend on books last month? Show me each expense
sql:
SELECT date, description, amount_clp FROM expenses
WHERE (category LIKE '%book%' OR tags LIKE '%book%' OR description LIKE '%book%')
  AND date >= date('now', 'start of month', '-1 month')
  AND date < date('now', 'start of month')
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Total', '', SUM(amount_clp) FROM expenses
WHERE (category LIKE '%book%' OR tags LIKE '%book%' OR description LIKE '%book%')
  AND date >= date('now', 'start of month', '-1 month')
  AND date < date('now', 'start of month')
